items.title: Unilever warns of a ‘subdued’ start to 2025 as ice cream triple-listing looms, knocking investor confidence
items.description: “Consistency is not about one good year. We know there is a lot still to do," Unilever CEO Hein Schumacher said.

items.title: Senate confirms Tulsi Gabbard as Trump’s intelligence chief as GOP falls in line—except for one senator
items.description: Gabbard is an unconventional pick to oversee and coordinate the country's 18 intelligence agencies, given her past comments sympathetic to Russia.

items.title: Ken Griffin says he is ‘so appreciative’ of Elon Musk’s DOGE cuts but slammed Trump’s tariffs, saying they’re ‘what you do in the death throes of a nation’
items.description: The Citadel CEO said Trump’s tariffs will have “a permanent and adverse effect.”

items.title: Federal judge clears key hurdle for Trump and Musk’s government employee buyout plan

items.title: Elon Musk wants to tear out entire federal agencies: ‘It’s like a weed. If you don’t remove the roots, the weed will grow back’
items.description: Musk said the action of "deleting" entire agencies is necessary to prevent future administrations from rehiring what he believes are unnecessary roles...
